bug.description: This seems to be related to RaySampler <denchmark-link:https://travis-ci.com/github/rlworkgroup/garage/jobs/384803720#L2145>https://travis-ci.com/github/rlworkgroup/garage/jobs/384803720#L2145</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This seems to have been an out of memory exception that we encountered with travis. The same exception hasn't occurred with travis or GH actions since, so I'm inclined to close the issue.
